question: Robert Abela was recently elected as the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The 42 -year-old lawyer, Robert Abela was recently elected as the next Prime Minister of Malta. The previous Prime Minister of the country, Joseph Muscat was forced to exit the post last month, after he was found involved in the murder of a journalist.
The journalist Daphne Caruana Galizia was investigating corruption in the country and she was killed by a car bomb two years back. Robert Abela was elected as the leader of the ruling Labour Party with more than 57% votes.
